DOC.brief_summary: The study objective is to compare traditional and Wong methods of wound hydration for wound sealing following cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of Safety and Efficacy of Two Forms of Corneal Stromal Hydration
DOC.criteria: Visually significant cataract requiring surgery Evidence of Fuch's dystrophy, anterior basement membrane dystrophy, or corneal thinning or scarring Any intraoperative complications Cataract incision length < 1 mm Pregnancy
